name: Farspace
description:
Farspace is a small puzzle platformer that revolves around the use of a jetpack and interaction with objects and components within the game.

Controls:

  • c = interact
  • z = jump
  • x = shoot
  • r = restart
  • left & right arrow keys = left and right
  • up-arrow = jetpack

NOTE: 

  1. You can only use the jetpack after a jump
  2. You can interact with objects that have this symbol near or beside them: 

Assets:

  • Tile-palette and sprite: FREE minimal future pixelart 2D assetpack by Sam (itch.io)
  • Music: Listen to playlists featuring Daniel - Willett - Night - Moves by SOUND7 online for free on SoundCloud
  • Game Engine: Unity Real-Time Development Platform | 3D, 2D VR & AR Engine
